##### **Transcript**

Introducing Agent Mode in Excel. In Excel, start with a prompt and Copilot gets to work while you steer and guide. Copilot explains its approach and using its Excel expertise, applies the right formulas and charts. In just a couple of minutes, you get a full summary of key insights and validation steps to give you confidence in its work. Only Copilot speaks Excel natively. And with Agent Mode, Copilot builds Excel objects like table structures, formula syntax, and pivot tables. This means you can directly manipulate the grid yourself or iterate with Copilot to make adjustments. Try Agent Mode in Excel today
